definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: The roc flew so high that I couldn't see the earth below me.
sentences.chinese: 大鵬鳥飛得很高，根本看不到底下地面的情形。

sentences.english: I untied the turban from the bird's foot.
sentences.chinese: 於是便把頭巾從大鵬鳥的腳上解了下來。

sentences.english: As soon as I had done this, the bird jumped on a large snake.
sentences.chinese: 我一解下頭巾，大鵬鳥一躍撲向一條大蛇。
